definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: One category has comparatively adequate farm implements and some funds.
sentences.chinese: 一部分贫农有比较充足的农具和相当数量的资金。

sentences.english: They use oxen to pull farm equipment.
Nunchucks originated as a farm tool for beating weeds.
sentences.chinese: 最初是作为一双截棍殴打杂草农具。

sentences.english: The improved farm tools are efficient as well as easy to handle.
sentences.chinese: 新式农具既轻巧，又出活。

sentences.english: White mouthfuls of casting iron's gentle-treatment is a important craft to make farm implements.
sentences.chinese: 白口铸铁的柔化处理就是制造农具的重要工艺。

sentences.english: They ordered quantities of farm implements.
The billhook was originally developed from a farming tool, and consists of an axe and hook on the end of a long pole.
sentences.chinese: 钩镰最初起源于农具，其长柄顶端置有斧刃和利钩。

sentences.english: They will teach us how to repair farm tools.
The farmer housed farm tools in a shed.
sentences.chinese: 农民把农具收藏在小屋里。

sentences.english: Yangcheng Mouldboard is one of the famous brand products of the China farming tools.
sentences.chinese: 阳城犁镜是我国传统农具的名牌产品。

sentences.english: Plows and threshing machines are farm implements.
Last evening I did nothing but repair my farm tools.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上我除了修理农具外，没有做别的事。

sentences.english: This commune run factory turns out various kinds of agricultural implements.
sentences.chinese: 这家社办工厂生产的各种各样的农具。

sentences.english: Repair farm tools to prepare for spring ploughing.
A lot of farm tools are piled in the storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 库房里堆放着许多农具。

sentences.english: The pigs had set aside the harness-room as a headquarters for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 猪已经把农具室当作他们的总指挥部了。
